src:
Xiaomi Mi Note 10 Pakai Lima Kamera
02 Nov 2019, 19:59 by Anggoro Suryo Jati, Anggoro Suryo Jati - detikInet


Foto: Xiaomi

Jakarta - Xiaomi bakal merilis Mi Note 10 pada 14 November mendatang, dan ponsel ini bakal dilengkapi dengan lima kamera belakang.Meski tak banyak informasi yang dirilis Xiaomi soal ponsel terbarunya itu, mereka membeberkan susunan lima kamera belakang yang ada di Mi Note 10, demikian dikutip detikINET dari GSM Arena, Sabtu (2/11/2019).Ke-5 kamaera belakang itu terdiri dari kamera utama 108 megapixel, kamera 5 megapixel dengan lensa tele 5x, kamera portrait 12 megapixel, kamera dengan lensa ultra wide 20 megapixel, dan kamera macro 2 megapixel.Perlu diingat, Mi Note 10 adalah versi global dari Mi CC9 Pro, jadi kemungkinan besar speknya pun sama. Yaitu kamera selfie 32 megapixel, sistem optical image stabilization di dua kameranya, serta baterai 5.260 mAh dengan dukungan fast charge 30W.


Foto: GSM Arena

Mi CC9 Pro baru-baru ini muncul di laman pendaftaran perangkat di China yang bernama TENNA. Ponsel tersebut mempunyai layar OLED 6,47 inch FHD+ dengan prosesor octa core 2,2 GHz yang kemungkinan besar adalah bagian dari chip Snapdragon 730G.Namun untuk spek lengkap, harga, dan ketersediaannya, kita harus menunggu sampai Xiaomi resmi merilis ponsel tersebut. Peluncuran CC9 Pro bakal dilakukan pada 5 November mendatang, sementara versi globalnya akan meluncur pada 14 November. Simak Video "''Membumi'' Jadi Kunci Xiaomi Gaet 24 Juta Pengguna di Tanah Air"[Gambas:Video 20detik](asj/afr)
text:
Xiaomi Mi Note 10 Use Five Cameras
02 Nov 2019, 19:59 by Anggoro Suryo Jati, Anggoro Suryo Jati - detikInet


Photo: Xiaomi

Jakarta - Xiaomi will release the Mi Note 10 on November 14th, and this phone will be equipped with five rear cameras. Although there isn't much information released by Xiaomi about the new cellphone, they revealed the arrangement of five rear cameras in the Mi Note 10, as quoted. detikINET from GSM Arena, Saturday (11/02/2019). The 5 rear cameras consist of a 108 megapixel main camera, a 5 megapixel camera with a 5x telephoto lens, a 12 megapixel portrait camera, a camera with an ultra wide 20 megapixel lens, and a camera macros 2 megapixels. Keep in mind, Mi Note 10 is a global version of Mi CC9 Pro, so it's likely the specs are the same. That is a 32 megapixel selfie camera, optical image stabilization system in two cameras, and a 5,260 mAh battery with 30W fast charge support.


Photo: GSM Arena

Mi CC9 Pro recently appeared on a device registration page in China called TENNA. The cellphone has a 6.47 inch FHD + OLED screen with a 2.2 GHz octa core processor which is most likely part of the Snapdragon 730G chip. But for full specs, price, and availability, we have to wait until Xiaomi officially releases the phone. The CC9 Pro will launch on November 5, while the global version will launch on November 14. Check out the video "Earthbound" So the Key to Xiaomi Gaining 24 Million Users in the Country "[Gambas: Video 20 seconds] (asj / afr)
